TopicTitle: No funcionan los motores de combustible liquido (Liquid fuel engines do not work)

Articles.Content:
Los motores de combustible liquido me deja ponerlos pero a la hora de despegar los inicio pero no consumir combustible ni avanza el cohete. Sin embargo los demás motores si funcionan. Probar desinstalar e instalar el juego de nuevo, mirado tutoriales y también mirado en esta misma página, pero no tengo solución y sé mi acaba la paciencia, por favor ayudadme.

 

[Moderator Edit - English Translation using Google Translate]

The liquid fuel engines let me put them on but at the time of taking off the start but not consume fuel or advance the rocket. However the other engines do work. Try uninstalling and installing the game again, looked at tutorials and also looked at this same page, but I have no solution and I know my patience ends, please help me.

Hi and welcome to the forum, @Marty_919 

As this is an English speaking forum, I took the freedom to translate your post via Google Translate:

The liquid fuel engines let me put them on but at the time of taking off the start but not consume fuel or advance the rocket. However the other engines do work. Try uninstalling and installing the game again, looked at tutorials and also looked at this same page, but I have no solution and I know my patience ends, please help me.

Without a screenshot, I'd assume you either didn't enable the engine by staging (space bar), or didn't throttle up (Z for full throttle, X for zero throttle, Shift to increase, Ctrl to decrease), check the left gauge on the Nav Ball.


Engine shutdown



Engine active

 


No throttle
